misc: Has planted his seeds in four different women in four different decades.
biography: Mikko, a seasoned player from Lakeside Golf Vammala, brings a wealth of experience to the greens of the Hector Trophée. Known for his contemplative demeanor on the course, Mikko is a strategist, always calculating his next move with meticulous precision.

With the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025 marking his 11th appearance, Mikko's dedication to the tournament is undeniable. While the coveted Hector Trophée and Victor Trophy have eluded him thus far, his consistent presence underscores his commitment to the sport and the pursuit of excellence. He is a formidable competitor, always in control and never giving his opponents an inch.

Off the course, Mikko is a man of diverse interests and passions. A true Renaissance man, he has planted his seeds in four different women in four different decades, demonstrating his appreciation for the complexities and beauties of life.
